item.text: First of all, then, I urge that requests, prayers, intercessions, and thanks be offered on behalf of all people,

even <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5247" class="">authority</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> we may <st data-num="1236" class="">lead</st> a <st data-num="2263" class="">peaceful</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2272" class="">quiet</st> <st data-num="979" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2150" class="">godliness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4587" class="">dignity</st>.

<st data-num="3778">Such</st> prayer for all<n id="1" /> is <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="587" class="">welcomed</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st>,

since <st data-num="3739">he</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> to be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="1922" class="">knowledge</st> of the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> there is <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3316" class="">intermediary</st><n id="1" /> between <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="444" class="">humanity</st>, <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, himself <st data-num="444" class="">human</st>,<n id="2" />

who <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> as a <st data-num="487" class="">ransom</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, <st data-num="3142" class="">revealing</st> God’s purpose at <st data-num="2398" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2540">appointed time</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1519">For</st> <st data-num="3739">this</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> was <st data-num="5087" class="">appointed</st> a <st data-num="2783" class="">preacher</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostle</st>—I am <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>;<n id="1" /> I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5574" class="">lying</st>—and a <st data-num="1320" class="">teacher</st> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.
So I want the men in every place to pray, lifting up holy hands without anger or dispute.
Likewise the women are to dress in suitable apparel, with modesty and self-control. Their adornment must not be with braided hair and gold or pearls or expensive clothing,

<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>, as is <st data-num="4241" class="">proper</st> for <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> who <st data-num="1861" class="">profess</st> <st data-num="2317">reverence for God</st>.

A <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> must <st data-num="3129" class="">learn</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2271" class="">quietly</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="5292" class="">submissiveness</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2010" class="">allow</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> to <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="831">exercise authority</st><n id="2" /> over a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>. She must <st data-num="1510" class="">remain</st> <st data-num="2271" class="">quiet</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="76" class="">Adam</st> was <st data-num="4111" class="">formed</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> and <st data-num="1534" class="">then</st> <st data-num="2096" class="">Eve</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="76" class="">Adam</st> was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="538" class="">deceived</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>, because she was <st data-num="1818">fully deceived</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096">fell</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3847" class="">transgression</st>.<n id="2" />
But she will be delivered through childbearing, if she continues in faith and love and holiness with self-control.
